file_id.title: ID of post cover image file
file_id.description:
ID of post cover image file. 

 NOTE: if the cover_image has not been uploaded, this value is "-1"

url.title: Url of post cover image file
url.description:
Url of post cover image file. 

 NOTE: if the cover_image has not been uploaded, this value is null

name.title: Name of post cover image file
name.description:
Name of post cover image file. 

 NOTE: if the cover_image has not been uploaded, this value is null
